verses.text: So they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w set|strong="H3322"\w* it in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* had \w pitched|strong="H5186"\w* for it: and they \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* burnt \w sacrifices|strong="H5930"\w* and peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And when \w David|strong="H1732"\w* had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w offering|strong="H5927"\w* the burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* and the peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, he \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And he \w dealt|strong="H2505"\w* to every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, both \w man|strong="H0376"\w* and \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, to every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* a \w loaf|strong="H3603"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and a good piece of \w flesh|strong="H0829"\w*, and a \w flagon|strong="H0809"\w* \add of wine\add*.

¶ And he \w appointed|strong="H5414"\w* \add certain\add* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and to \w record|strong="H2142"\w*, and to \w thank|strong="H3034"\w* and \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

\w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w next|strong="H4932"\w* to him \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, \w Jeiel|strong="H3273"\w*, and \w Shemiramoth|strong="H8070"\w*, and \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w*, and \w Mattithiah|strong="H4993"\w*, and \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w*, and \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*, and \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w*: and \w Jeiel|strong="H3273"\w* with \w psalteries|strong="H5035"\w* and with \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*; but \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w* made a \w sound|strong="H8085"\w* with \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*;\f + \fr 16.5 \ft with psalteries…: Heb. with instruments of psalteries and harps\f*

\w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* also and \w Jahaziel|strong="H3166"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* with \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ Then on that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w first|strong="H7218"\w* \add this psalm\add* to \w thank|strong="H3034"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w* and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.

Give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, make \w known|strong="H3045"\w* his \w deeds|strong="H5949"\w* among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
\w Sing|strong="H7891"\w* unto him, sing \w psalms|strong="H2167"\w* unto him, \w talk|strong="H7878"\w* ye of all his \w wondrous|strong="H6381"\w* works.

\w Glory|strong="H1984"\w* ye in his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: let the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of them \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
\w Seek|strong="H1875"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* and his \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* his \w marvellous|strong="H6381"\w* works that he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, his \w wonders|strong="H4159"\w*, and the \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* of his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*;
O ye \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, ye \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, his chosen \w ones|strong="H0972"\w*.
He \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; his \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \add are\add* in all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

Be ye \w mindful|strong="H2142"\w* \w always|strong="H5769"\w* of his \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*; the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \add which\add* he \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* to a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*;
\add Even of the covenant\add* which he \w made|strong="H3772"\w* with \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, and of his \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* unto \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*;

And hath \w confirmed|strong="H5975"\w* the same to \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* for a \w law|strong="H2706"\w*, \add and\add* to \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add for\add* an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Unto thee will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, the \w lot|strong="H2256"\w* of your \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*;\f + \fr 16.18 \ft the lot: Heb. the cord\f*
When ye were but \w few|strong="H4557"\w*, even a \w few|strong="H4592"\w*, and \w strangers|strong="H1481"\w* in it.\f + \fr 16.19 \ft few, even: Heb. men of number, etc\f*

And \add when\add* they \w went|strong="H1980"\w* from \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* to \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, and from \add one\add* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* to \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*;
He \w suffered|strong="H3240"\w* no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to do them \w wrong|strong="H6231"\w*: yea, he \w reproved|strong="H3198"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* for their sakes,
\add Saying\add*, \w Touch|strong="H5060"\w* not mine \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*, and do my \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* no \w harm|strong="H7489"\w*.

\w Sing|strong="H7891"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; shew \w forth|strong="H1319"\w* from \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* his \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.
\w Declare|strong="H5608"\w* his \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*; his marvellous \w works|strong="H6381"\w* among all \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*.

For \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* to be \w praised|strong="H1984"\w*: he also \add is\add* to be \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* above all \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

For all the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add are\add* \w idols|strong="H0457"\w*: but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w Glory|strong="H1935"\w* and \w honour|strong="H1926"\w* \add are\add* in his \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*; \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* and \w gladness|strong="H2304"\w* \add are\add* in his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H3051"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, ye \w kindreds|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w give|strong="H3051"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* and \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H3051"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \add due\add* unto his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: \w bring|strong="H5375"\w* an \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him: \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* in the \w beauty|strong="H1927"\w* of \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w*.

\w Fear|strong="H2342"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: the \w world|strong="H8398"\w* also shall be \w stable|strong="H3559"\w*, that it be not \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*.

Let the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*, and let the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w*: and let \add men\add* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w reigneth|strong="H4427"\w*.

Let the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w roar|strong="H7481"\w*, and the \w fulness|strong="H4393"\w* thereof: let the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H5970"\w*, and all that \add is\add* therein.

Then shall the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w wood|strong="H3293"\w* sing \w out|strong="H7442"\w* at the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, because he \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* to \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

O give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for \add he is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w* ye, \w Save|strong="H3467"\w* us, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of our \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*, and gather us \w together|strong="H6908"\w*, and \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* us from the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, that we may give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* to thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \add and\add* \w glory|strong="H7623"\w* in thy \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*, and \w praised|strong="H1984"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

¶ So he \w left|strong="H5800"\w* there \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w* and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*, as every \w day’s|strong="H3117"\w* \w work|strong="H1697"\w* \w required|strong="H3117"\w*:

And \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w* with their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w*; \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w* also the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeduthun|strong="H3038"\w* and \w Hosah|strong="H2621"\w* \add to be\add* \w porters|strong="H7778"\w*:

And \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the high \w place|strong="H1116"\w* that \add was\add* at \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*,

To \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* and \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, and \add to do\add* according to all that is \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which he \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;  +  r 16.40  t morning…: Heb. in the morning, and in the evening *

And with them \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w* and \w Jeduthun|strong="H3038"\w*, and the \w rest|strong="H7605"\w* that were \w chosen|strong="H1305"\w*, who were \w expressed|strong="H5344"\w* by \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, to give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, because his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*;

And with them \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w* and \w Jeduthun|strong="H3038"\w* with \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w* and \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w* for those that should make a \w sound|strong="H8085"\w*, and with \w musical|strong="H7892"\w* \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeduthun|strong="H3038"\w* \add were\add* \w porters|strong="H8179"\w*.\f + \fr 16.42 \ft porters: Heb. for the gate\f*

And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w returned|strong="H5437"\w* to \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.
